issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

iPad 3.2.2 mobilesdk 1.5.0.d02c264

1.ks iPhone Idiom > Phone > Music (have some music on the device)
2.invoke picker, pick a song and play it, look for label to appear with the song info and prog bar.

results: it doesn't appear. After trying a few songs, it started working, at which point I could no longer get it to fail.

seen in 1.4.1.1

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: Song titles are not displayed (Intermittant) on iPad

comments.body:
{html}

This and #2087 are most likely bugs that relate from the iPhone idiom being presented on iPad and not scaling properly. Visual bugs between idioms should be expected under some circumstances, but we will take a look at this when there is time.

{html}
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
